title: Single of The Week: Hot Chip
body:
[  
](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/music-hotchip06.jpg)

_I Feel Better_, the second single from the latest **Hot Chip** LP may not be a huge detachment from the usual **Hot Chip** sound, but with a sound so wonderful this is hardly a bad thing. Filled with uplifting strings and a snappy beat, the lyrics intertwine around the instrumentation with grace and delicacy. Again this isn’t most original sounding **Hot Chip** record ever conceived, but the ringing steal pans and intertwining harmonies will no doubt bring you back for more.

[Watch The Video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VurR44pxUKo)
